amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike all of the funding for the Department of Energy's Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy program and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for the Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy by $1,789,000,000 and including the amount made available for program direction and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Byrne amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 110 - 310 (Roll no. 376).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Byrne amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 110 - 310 (Roll no. 376).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Byrne.
